features.1: Limited to 5 hours of monthly playback

noCommitments.title: No Compromise

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can change your plan anytime from your account settings.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial period?
freeTrial.answer: The standard plan is completely free. For Premium, we offer 7 days free trial.

placeholders.adminArea: Ex: General Administration, User Management, etc.

errors.formValidation: Please correct the errors in the form

notice.title: üç™ Use of Cookies
notice.description: We use our own and third-party cookies to improve your experience, personalize content and analyze the use of our platform. Cookies help us offer you a more personalized and efficient service.
notice.legal: According to Law 34/2002 on Information Society Services (LSSI) and the RGPD, we need your consent to use non-essential cookies. Technical cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the site.
notice.autoAccept: By browsing, scrolling or continuing to use the site, you automatically accept our cookies.

page.title: Cookies Policy
page.subtitle: Complete information about the use of cookies at ESIMedia and how to manage your preferences

whatAre.title: What are cookies?
whatAre.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website.
whatAre.purpose: They help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience, allowing the site to function correctly.

weUse.title: Cookies we use
weUse.description: At ESIMedia we use different types of cookies to improve the functionality of the site, personalize content and analyze the use of our platform.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the website and cannot be disabled. They do not store personally identifiable information.

analytics.title: Analytical Cookies
analytics.description: They help us understand how you interact with the website by providing information about the pages visited, time spent and other statistical data.

legal.title: Legal Basis
legal.gdpr: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR): Ensures the protection of personal data in the EU
legal.lssi: Law 34/2002 on Information Society Services (LSSI): Regulates the use of cookies in Spain
legal.lopd: Organic Data Protection Law: Complements data protection at the national level

rights.title: Your Rights under the GDPR
rights.description: As a user, you have the following rights regarding the processing of your data:

access.title: Right of Access
access.description: You can request information about what personal data we have about you

rectification.title: Right of Rectification
rectification.description: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data

erasure.title: Right of Deletion
erasure.description: You can request the deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances

objection.title: Right to Oppose
objection.description: You can object to the processing of your personal data in certain situations

manage.title: How to Manage Cookies
manage.description: You can manage cookies directly from your browser. Here we show you how:

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For any questions about cookies or data protection, you can contact us:

language.purpose: Stores the language selected by the user

ga.purpose: Google Analytics main cookie to distinguish unique users

gaId.purpose: Google Analytics cookie specific to this property

modal.title: Change Subscription Plan
modal.changeDescription: Change your subscription plan to access more features.

confirmation.title: Confirm Plan Change
confirmation.warning: This action will change your subscription plan immediately.

security.title: Security Settings
security.changePasswordDescription: We help you by evaluating the strength of your password and guiding you through the change process.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account by using an authenticator app

instructions.title: Follow these steps to set up 2FA:
instructions.step1: Download and install Google Authenticator (or another similar app) on your phone
instructions.step2: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app
instructions.step3: Enter your app's 6-digit code to verify

qrCode.title: Scan QR Code
qrCode.alt: QR code for Google Authenticator configuration

verify.title: Check Settings
verify.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup.

errors.verificationFailed: Error verifying code. Please try again.

success.enabled: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled!

threeFactor.title: Third Factor of Authentication
threeFactor.description: Receive verification codes by email for greater security

setup.title: Configure Third Factor Authentication
setup.emailDescription: Verification codes will be sent to this email address

verify.title: Enter the Verification Code
verify.description: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email to complete the setup.

errors.verificationFailed: Error verifying code. Please try again.
errors.sendFailed: Error sending verification code. Please try again.

success.enabled: The third authentication factor has been successfully enabled!
success.codeResent: The verification code has been forwarded to your email

cancellation.title: Account Cancellation
cancellation.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
cancellation.confirmDeleteDescription: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please think carefully.
cancellation.consequence1: You will lose access to all your data and content
cancellation.consequence2: All your posts and comments will be deleted
cancellation.consequence3: You will lose your interaction history
cancellation.consequence4: You will not be able to recover your account or your data
cancellation.finalWarning: Do you really want to continue?
cancellation.passwordRequiredMessage: To proceed with deleting your account, please enter your current password.

success.registrationCompleted: Welcome! Check your email to verify your account.
success.accountDeleted: See you soon! Your account has been deleted. We hope to see you soon!
success.contentUploading: We are verifying your content! This may take a few moments...

error.profileSaveFailed: Oops! Your profile information could not be updated
error.logoutFailed: Oops! Could not log out. Try again.
error.registrationFailed: Oh no! Registration could not be completed.
error.videoVerificationFailed: Oh! It looks like your video had a problem during verification. Check the file and try again.
error.audioVerificationFailed: Oops! Your audio file could not be verified correctly. Check that the file is in good condition.

email.minLength: The email must be between 6 and 100 characters.
email.maxLength: The email must be between 6 and 100 characters.

firstName.minLength: The name must be between 3 and 50 characters.
firstName.maxLength: The name must be between 3 and 50 characters.
firstName.pattern: The name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes.

lastName.minLength: Last names must be between 3 and 50 characters.
lastName.maxLength: Last names must be between 3 and 50 characters.
lastName.pattern: Last names can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes.

alias.minLength: The alias must be between 3 and 12 characters.
alias.maxLength: The alias must be between 3 and 12 characters.
alias.pattern: The alias must begin and end with a letter or number, without consecutive hyphens.
alias.noConsecutive: The alias cannot contain consecutive hyphens or underscores.

birthDate.required: The date of birth is mandatory.
birthDate.future: The date of birth cannot be in the future.
birthDate.tooYoung: You must be at least 4 years old.
birthDate.tooOld: The date of birth cannot be more than 120 years ago.

contentTitle.minLength: Title must be at least 3 characters

contentDescription.minLength: Description must contain at least 10 characters if provided

contentMinimumAge.range: The minimum age must be an integer between 0 and 99

contentAvailableUntil.future: The date must be after today

contentTags.minTags: You must provide at least one tag
contentTags.maxTags: You can't have more than 10 tags
contentTags.tagMinLength: Each tag must be at least 2 characters
contentTags.tagPattern: Tags can only contain letters, numbers and spaces

department.minLength: The department/area must be at least 3 characters

videoUrl.invalid: Only YouTube and Vimeo URLs are allowed

listName.minLength: The list name must be at least 3 characters
listName.maxLength: The list name cannot exceed 100 characters
